data.name: Fable of Sand Paws
data.detailed_description:
"Fable of Sand Paws" combines exploration, puzzles and a little sokoban, in the game you will have to explore 3D dioramas, in search of the best way to collect the treasures scattered around the scenario. Move the camera around the dioramas to find secret passages and hidden areas, send the cat Sand Paws to explore these locations, and find out how to reach the treasures!



Throughout the game, you'll be able to move platforms and different blocks to create new accesses and paths to the treasures. The movement of the Sand Paws cat is done through point and click mechanics, so it will always look for the best way to get to the point where you aim. It collects the treasures automatically, as soon as it reaches it.




Collect keys to unlock doors that are closing off certain area.




Hit boxes to clear paths, solve puzzles or use them to hold down buttons.

Features

  • More than 30+ challenging scenarios
  • 5 different worlds
  • Bite-sized gameplay. Levels take ~1-4 minutes each.
  • Original soundtrack
  • Gameplay that mixes exploration with puzzles
  • Cute kittens


[img{STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/desculpIng.png][/img]

data.short_description: Sand Paw is an adventurous cat who is looking for treasures! Explore the 3D dioramas, rotate the camera to find hidden locations, move blocks and platforms, solve puzzles, find and collect all the lost treasures!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: 2Gz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card Supporting DirectX 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
